c2ff57ff-4d4f-445d-a753-5214fb921198: In addition to other effects, the party members cannot perform charge {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, and suffer a -3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} scores.
623a16f8-da7f-448c-b6e8-4d5093756521: In addition to other effects, the party members suffer a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} scores. Additionally, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration check{/g} with a -6 penalty each time they cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
2d839716-ed91-4b9c-bc68-00966fd1be2f: Party members suffer a 15% {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Fail_Chance}arcane spell failure chance{/g}, a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} scores and a -3 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g}.
